001package org.consensusj.daemon.micronaut;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.Module;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.BitcoinNetwork;
005import org.bitcoinj.base.ScriptType;
006import org.bitcoinj.core.Context;
007import org.bitcoinj.utils.AppDataDirectory;
008import org.bitcoinj.wallet.KeyChainGroupStructure;
009import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion.RpcServerModule;
010import io.micronaut.context.annotation.Factory;
011import org.bitcoinj.kits.WalletAppKit;
012import org.slf4j.Logger;
013import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
014
015import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
016import java.io.File;
017import java.io.IOException;
018import java.nio.file.Files;
019
020/**
021 * Initialize bitcoinj components, etc.
022 */
023@Factory
024public class BitcoinFactory {
025    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(BitcoinFactory.class);
026
027    @Singleton
028    public WalletAppKit getKit(BitcoinDaemonConfig config) throws IOException {
029        if (!(config.network() instanceof BitcoinNetwork)) {
030            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unsupported network");
031        }
032        Context.propagate(new Context());
033        String filePrefix = config.walletBaseName() + "-" + config.network();
034        File dataDirectory = config.dataDir() == null
035                ? config.network() == BitcoinNetwork.REGTEST
036                    ? Files.createTempDirectory(config.walletBaseName()).toFile()  // null && regtest -> temporary dir
037                    : AppDataDirectory.get(config.walletBaseName()).toFile()       // null -> app data dir
038                : config.dataDir().toFile();                                       // non-null -> use Path from config
039        log.info("Creating WalletAppKit for {} <============", config.network().id());
040        log.info("Returning WalletAppKit bean, wallet directory: {}, prefix: {}", dataDirectory.getAbsolutePath(), filePrefix);
041        return new WalletAppKit((BitcoinNetwork) config.network(), ScriptType.P2PKH, KeyChainGroupStructure.BIP43, dataDirectory, filePrefix);
042    }
043
044    @Singleton
045    public Module jacksonModule() {
046        return new RpcServerModule();
047    }
048}
